name: 透
trans:
Alrightー
Playing it nowー

name: 円香
trans: Mm.

name: 雛菜
trans: Let's gooo～!

name: 小糸
trans: P-Please, go ahead…!

name: 小糸
trans:
W-Woah…
T-This is amazing…!

name: 小糸
trans: They're playing our song...!

name: 円香
trans: Well,

name: 円香
trans: that'll be because the show's about us.

name: 透
trans:
Fufu.
Hmー

name: 雛菜
text:
でもそれって
すごいことなんじゃない～？
trans:
But watching it like this, 
isn't this like the coolest thing～?!

name: 小糸
trans:
...Y-Yeah!
It really is cool…!

name: 透
trans: Um...

name: 透
trans:
Ah, 
sorry.

name: 透
text:
字、小さくて
カンペの
trans:
The writing was too small. 
On the cue card.

name: 透
text:
『浅倉
まずは写経を体験させていただきます』
trans:
“Asakura -
Firstly, we'll begin by copying the sutra by hand.”

name: 円香
text: それ、『浅倉』は読まなくていいやつ
trans: You don't have to read out the “Asakura” part, y'know.

name: 透
trans:
Ahー...
Fufu.

name: 雛菜
text:
なんか、これ
こんなにウケてたっけ～？
trans:
I don't get it, 
did we really get this many laughs at the time～?

name: 円香
text:
後から笑い声
乗せてるんでしょ
trans:
They edit in the laughter 
after the recording is done.

name: 雛菜
trans:
Ohhh～
I get it now～!

name: 小糸
text:
で、でも
こうやって大きい笑い声が聞こえると
trans: I-Isn't that because everything seems so much funnier

name: 小糸
text: すごく面白く感じない……？
trans: when you hear such a big laugh from the audience like this…?

name: 透
trans: Ah

name: 円香
text: ていうか、それが狙いなんじゃない？
trans: Isn't that what they're after in these kinds of shows?

name: 円香
trans: I can't say for sure though.

name: 雛菜
text:
声大きくするくらいなら
ヤラセじゃないもんね～
trans:
If it's loud laughter then 
it seems less fake, right～?

name: 雛菜
trans: Ouuuuch～!

name: 雛菜
text:
あは～……
雛菜寝ちゃってた～？
trans:
Aha～...
Did Hinana fall asleep～?

name: 円香
trans: ...Out like a light.

name: 雛菜
trans: Oh, well～...

name: 雛菜
text:
ん～
でも今のですっごい目、覚めたかも～！
trans:
Ahhh～
But thanks to that I'm suuuper awake now～!

name: 透
trans:
Ahー
Fufu.

name: 透
text:
ここ、覚めた
めっちゃ
trans:
This part woke me
right up.

name: 雛菜
text:
へ～
透先輩も寝てたのに、雛菜だけ叩かれたの～！？
trans:
No fair～
If Toru-senpai was sleeping too, why did only Hinana get hit～?!

name: 小糸
text:
と、透ちゃんは寝てなかったよ……！
ぎ、ギリギリだけど
trans:
T-Toru-chan wasn't sleeping though…!
W-Well...she almost was...

name: 透
text: 起こしてもらったから
trans: Thanks to a certain someone waking me up,

name: 透
trans: right?

name: 雛菜
text:
へ～
雛菜は起こしてもらってない～！
trans:
Ehhh～
But Hinana wasn't woken up at all～!

name: 円香
text:
……雛菜、夜も爆睡してたのに
なんでここでも寝てたの
trans:
Even though you slept so much at night... 
how did you end up to sleeping here too?

name: 雛菜
text:
だって
すっごい早起きだったでしょ～？
trans:
But we were up sooo early～! 
I can't help it.

name: 雛菜
text: 雛菜、いつもはもっとたくさん寝るもん～
trans: Hinana usually sleeps sooo much longer than this～

name: 円香
trans: Ah… right.

name: 雛菜
trans:
Ahhh～
I'm beat～...

name: 透
trans: Ahhhー...

name: 雛菜
text:
ね、そういえば
誰がいちばん早かった～？
trans:
Hey, now that I mention it, 
who was the first to get up～?

name: 雛菜
text:
雛菜
大変すぎてわかんなかったけど～……
trans:
It was too hard for
Hinana to tell～

name: 円香
trans: That'd be Koito.

name: 小糸
trans: Huh?

name: 透
trans:
Ahー
Fufu.

name: 透
trans: You might be right.

name: 雛菜
text:
なんだ～
雛菜じゃなかったのか～
trans:
So it wasn't Hinana then?～
Oh well～

name: 透
text:
あー……
まだやってない、これ
trans:
Ohー
I haven't given you this yet, Koito-chan.

name: 透
trans: Here, your drink.

name: 小糸
text:
え……！
だからそれはいいって……！
trans:
Eh…! 
It's really fine, I don't need anything…!

name: 雛菜
trans:
Ehhh～?
Stop right there～!

name: 雛菜
text:
小糸ちゃんがいいよって言ったら
もし次に雛菜が勝った時に、賞品貰いにくいでしょ～？
trans:
If Koito-chan doesn't want some, then when I go buy
them next time it'll be even harder for me to win the
special prize, y'know～?

name: 小糸
trans:
Uh…
Um...y-yeah…?

name: 円香
trans: ...Well, that's that then.

name: 透
trans: Mhm.

name: 透
trans: We'll save it then. For later.

name: 雛菜
text:
あ、エンディングも
曲かかった～
trans:
Ah! 
They played the song again during the ending～!

name: 透
trans:
Wait, 
it's over already?

name: 小糸
text:
な、なんか……
すっごい早かったね……
trans:
W-Wow… 
it went by so fast...

name: 円香
text: 何？　面白くなかった？
trans: What's up? Did you not enjoy it?

name: 小糸
text:
お、面白かった……！
と、思うけど……
trans:
I-I did...
I thought it was good…!

name: 小糸
text:
それって、わたしたちだけなのかな……って
思っちゃって……
trans:
I'm just wondering if maybe...it's only us that think so… 
or something like that...

name: 透
trans: We should give it our own ratings.

name: 透
trans:
Let's say 4%, 
from all of us here.
